title: Schema for Extracted Grundschutz-Check Data
description: A schema to hold the structured list of requirements and chapter headings extracted from a Grundschutz-Check document chunk.

anforderungen.description: A list of all security requirements found in the document chunk.

id.description: The full ID of the requirement, e.g., 'ISMS.1.A1'.

umsetzungserlaeuterung.description: The full text of the implementation explanation.

datumLetztePruefung.description: The date of the last check, extracted as seen in the document. The fallback for a missing date is '1970-01-01'.

pagenumber.description: The page number where this requirement was found.

zielobjekt_name.description: The Name of the Zielobjekt, if directly associated on the same page by the AI.
